com.facebook.litho

Class DebugComponentDescriptionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.DebugComponentDescriptionHelper

  • public class DebugComponentDescriptionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes DebugComponents for use in testing and debugging. Note that ComponentsConfiguration.isEndToEndTestRun must be enabled in order for this data to be collected.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DebugComponentDescriptionHelper.ExtraDescription
      An interface for callsite to append extra description into StringBuilder by given DebugComponent.

      • addViewDescription

        public static void addViewDescription(DebugComponent debugComponent,
                                      java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                                      int leftOffset,
                                      int topOffset,
                                      boolean embedded,
                                      boolean withProps,
                                      DebugComponentDescriptionHelper.ExtraDescription extraDescription)
        Appends a compact description of a DebugComponent for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        debugComponent - The DebugComponent
        sb - The StringBuilder to which the description is appended
        leftOffset - Offset of the parent component relative to litho view
        topOffset - Offset of the parent component relative to litho view
        embedded - Whether the call is embedded in "adb dumpsys activity"
        extraDescription - An interface for callsite to append extra description.
